actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Joint resolution to amend the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1968 to increase the limitation on the face amount of flood insurance coverage authorized to be outstanding and to extend the emergency flood insurance program.

summary.text: Provides under the Housing and Urban Development Act, for an increase in the limitation on the face amount of flood insurance coverage authorized to be outstanding. Extends the emergency flood insurance program through February 28, 1974.

titles.title: Joint resolution to amend the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1968 to increase the limitation on the face amount of flood insurance coverage authorized to be outstanding and to extend the emergency flood insurance program.
